item.title: Amber is the sole Hong Kong restaurant featured in the World's 50 Best Restaurants 2016
item.description:
Source: World’s 50 Best Restaurants website. Dishes from Amber. Amber, located in The Landmark Mandarin Oriental hotel in Hong Kong, has secured a place on the esteemed World’s 50 Best Restaurants list for the sixth consecutive year, achieving the ranking of 20th. Notably, Amber is the sole representative from Hong Kong to be featured on this prestigious list. The World’s 50 Best Restaurants list, likened to the Oscars of fine dining, serves as an annual global celebration of gastronomy, acknowledging restaurants worldwide for their culinary excellence...

item.description:

Kartika Wirjoatmodjo, the Director of Finance & Strategy at Bank Mandiri, stated that this competition aims to discover young individuals with entrepreneurial potential who can contribute to Indonesia’s growth. item.description:
The International Council of Shopping Centers (ICSC) Asia Pacific Shopping Center Awards recently celebrated excellence in the region’s shopping center industry. Awards recognized outstanding achievements in marketing, retail property design and development, and retail store design. item.title: Aon announces the recipients of the Aon Best Employers Singapore 2017 award
item.description:
Employee engagement at companies recognized as Aon Best Employers rose by two percentage points this year, reaching 82%. Aon Best Employers are setting the standard for positive employer branding, achieving scores from 83% to 92% in employee perception across all levels of tenure. Five special recognitions were given this year, including the introduction of a new award category: Best Employer for Startups. Source: Aon. Aon Best Employers Singapore 2017...

item.description:
The Stevie Awards, a leading business awards organization, is accepting entries for the 2020 Stevie Awards for Women in Business. This global competition is open to all female entrepreneurs, executives, and employees, as well as the organizations they lead. item.title: EY introduces the Entrepreneur of the Year 2016 award in Saudi Arabia
item.description:
For the third consecutive year, EY has announced the launch of the Entrepreneur Of The Year (EOY) 2016 award in Saudi Arabia. This year, the EOY will center on medium-sized enterprises, emphasizing their successes and the significance of their expansion and prosperity. The event has been conducted internationally for 29 years in 150 cities across 60 countries. Ahmed I. Reda, Office Managing Partner at EY, Jeddah, and Entrepreneur Of The Year Leader at EY, states, “As we celebrate the 30th anniversary of the EOY program globally, we are excited to host the Saudi Arabia EOY program again this year...

item.title: IHH Healthcare, NUS, Otis, and PSA set new standards for leadership and workplace mental health
item.description:
WorkWell Leaders (WWL), a Singapore-based non-profit focused on workplace wellbeing and mental health, has revealed the winners of the WorkWell Leaders Awards 2024. These awards acknowledge exemplary practices in promoting positive change within workplaces. WWL emphasized that these awards are unique in their recognition of specific elements of workplace wellbeing that drive business results, as well as leadership behaviors that foster cultural transformation within organizations. Anthea Ong, Founder and Chairperson of WorkWell Leaders, stressed the importance of addressing mental health proactively in the workplace, stating, “With 70% of Singapore’s population employed and spending a significant portion of their day at work, workplaces must serve as catalysts to support employees and their families...

item.title: CHKLC has announced the winners of the 2014 HK Corporate Governance Excellence Awards
item.description:
The Chamber of Hong Kong Listed Companies (CHKLC) recently revealed the winners of the Hong Kong Corporate Governance Excellence Awards 2014. The CHKLC defines corporate governance as respecting shareholder rights and values, maintaining board and management integrity, and demonstrating transparency and accountability. Dr. Eddy Fong, Judging Panel Chairman, highlighted that the awardees went beyond standard practices, tailoring their governance strategies to address industry-specific risks and challenges. “Furthermore,” he stated, “winning companies view sustainability as inseparable from good corporate governance, crucial for long-term growth...

item.title: Heroes from Asian brands share their brand journey stories
item.description:
Influential Brands, a program organized by Brand Alliance, held its 2014 conference in Singapore on November 7th. The event, themed “Celebrating brand leadership and Asia brand heroes,” recognized the success of leading brands in the region. Several individuals representing these successful brands participated in a panel discussion, sharing their insights and experiences. item.description:
TaxiPixi, a mobile application for booking taxis, has won the award for best Travel App in South Asia at the 5th annual mBillionth Awards. The app works by connecting customers to taxi drivers from different companies in real time. The mBillionth Awards recognize exceptional mobile applications and digital material from eight South Asian countries: Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, the Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan, and Sri Lanka. item.title: The award ceremony for the Zayed Sustainability Prize 2019 took place
item.description:
